com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk.configuration_control

Class ConfigurationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk.configuration_control.ConfigurationControl

  • public class ConfigurationControl
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class used for configuring a node.

      • checkNodeIdentity

        public void checkNodeIdentity(Subnet subnetToCheck,
                              CheckNodeBehaviourCallback callback)
        Checks if the node is set to be a node identity in a given Subnet.
        Parameters:
        subnetToCheck - Subnet in which the node is suspected to be a node identity.
        callback - CheckNodeBehaviourCallback called when a status from the node has been received.

      • setProxy

        public void setProxy(boolean enable,
                     SetNodeBehaviourCallback callback)
        Sets a proxy status to a given boolean value for the node.
        Parameters:
        enable - Boolean representing if proxy status is to be enabled or disabled.
        callback - SetNodeBehaviourCallback called when a status from the node has been received.

      • setRelay

        public void setRelay(boolean enable,
                     int count,
                     int interval,
                     SetNodeBehaviourCallback callback)
        Sets a relay status to a given boolean value for the node.
        Parameters:
        enable - Boolean representing if relay status is to be enabled or disabled.
        count - Integer representing a new value of a retransmission count.
        interval - Integer representing a new value of a retransmission interval.
        callback - SetNodeBehaviourCallback called when a status from the node has been received.

      • setFriend

        public void setFriend(boolean enable,
                      SetNodeBehaviourCallback callback)
        Sets a friend status to a given boolean value for the node.
        Parameters:
        enable - Boolean representing if friend status is to be enabled or disabled.
        callback - SetNodeBehaviourCallback called when a status from the node has been received.

      • setNodeIdentity

        public void setNodeIdentity(boolean enable,
                            Subnet subnet,
                            SetNodeBehaviourCallback callback)
        Sets a node identity to a given boolean value for the node.
        Parameters:
        enable - Boolean representing if node identity status is to be enabled or disabled.
        subnet - Subnet for which the status is to be set.
        callback - SetNodeBehaviourCallback called when a status from the node has been received.
